value.name: Abortion-rights activist who disrupted Mass was targeted for anti-police views, attorney says
value.description: An attorney is claiming that his client has been selectively prosecuted following an abortion rights protest at a Columbus cathedral in January.

value.name: Activists call for end to police 'qualified immunity' in Ohio one year after George Floyd's murder
value.description: Mothers of those killed by Columbus police gathered Tuesday on the one-year anniversary of George Floyd's death to call for end to qualified immunity

value.name: After Ma'Khia Bryant shooting, Columbus mayor requests federal probe of police
value.description: Before the recent police shootings, the city was sued over the 2016 shooting of Henry Green, a Black man, by two undercover white police officers working in an anti-crime summer initiative.

value.name: Vigil held outside Ohio Statehouse honors George Floyd and others killed by police
value.description: On the steps of the William McKinley statue facing the Ohio Statehouse Tuesday evening lay dozens of broken records, each with the name of a Black person killed by Columbus Police.
